parameters.name: ConfigType
parameters.description:
Configuration type, which can be used to query global or rule-based configurations. Possible values:
- global: Query global configuration.
- rule: Query rule-based configuration.

This parameter is optional; if not provided, it will not distinguish between global and rule-based configurations.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: Page number, defaulting to 1 if not provided.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: Number of items per page, with a maximum of 500. Defaults to 500 if not provided.

parameters.name: RuleName
parameters.description: Rule name. This parameter is not required when adding a global configuration.

parameters.name: SiteId
parameters.description: Site ID, which can be obtained by calling the [ListSites](~~ListSites~~) interface.

parameters.name: SiteVersion
parameters.description: Site version number. For sites with version management enabled, this parameter can specify the site version for which the configuration takes effect, defaulting to version 0.
